dictionary_deleteAll.message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa ZONSE kumasulira mu dikishonale?

dictionary_deleteConfirmation.message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa kumasulira uku?

dictionary_description.message: Sungani kumasulira mu dikishonale kuti muzipeza mwachangu mtsogolo

dictionary_emptyDictionary.message: Dikishonale ndi yopanda kanthu, yambani kudzaza ndi kutanthauzira zolembedwa zina

dictionary_notFoundEntries.message: Palibe kumasulira komwe kumagwirizana ndi zosefera izi komwe kunapezeka

editorWindow_message_invalidTitle.message: Dzina la module liyenera kukhala ndi zilembo zosachepera chimodzi

ext_description.message: Kumasulira masamba a pa intaneti, kumasulira mawu, dikishonale, mbiri, omasulira makonda, zonse zomwe mukufuna kuthyola zopinga za chilankhulo

ext_name.message: Linguist - womasulira masamba a pa intaneti

history_control_selectEntry.description: Description in finite form "to pick" with explaining what this checkbox will do

history_message_clearHistoryConfirmation.message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa mbiri? Zolemba zonse zichotsedwa

history_message_deleteEntryConfirmation.message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa cholemba ichi?

history_message_deleteSelectedEntriesCon.message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa zolemba zosankhidwa ($1)?

history_message_entriesNotFound.message: Palibe kumasulira komwe kunapezeka kofanana ndi fyuluta

history_notification_disabled.message: Kulemba mbiri kwatsekedwa, kotero zolemba zatsopano sizidzawonekera. Mutha kusintha izi mu <slot id=preferences>Preferences</slot>

pageTranslator_sitePreferences_autoTrans.message: Masulira nthawi zonse pa chinenero ichi
Gwiritsani ntchito malamulo wamba pa chinenero ichi

settings_message_importConfig_invalidFil.message: Fayilo ya config yoperekedwa ndi yolakwika kapena yawonongeka, ndipo sangathe kukonzedwa

settings_message_resetConfig_confirm.message: Tsimikizani kuti mubwezeretse makonda ku makonda oyambira

settings_option_cache_clear_desc.message: Ngati muwona zolakwika za kumasulira kapena mwangozi kumasulira zolemba zachinsinsi pomwe cache yayatsidwa, mutha kuchotsa deta yonse mu cache
settings_option_cache_clear_desc.description: Explanation for user about cases when it's useful to clear cache

settings_option_cache_enable_desc.message: Pamene cache yayatsidwa, zolemba zomwe zidasuliridwa kale zidzamasuliridwa mwachangu popanda zopempha zina ku utumiki womasulira

settings_option_cache_ignoreCase_desc.message: Pamene yayatsidwa, kumasulira kosungidwa kudzagwiritsidwa ntchito pazolemba zamitundu yosiyanasiyana, zomwe zingayambitse kusokoneza kumasulira pazochitika zina

settings_option_customTranslatorModule.description: An user defined code that implements a translation module

settings_option_customTranslatorModule_d.message: Mutha kuwonjezera maimidwe a kumasulira mwamakonda omwe amagwiritsa ntchito ntchito zanu zomwe mumakonda. Dziwani zambiri mu <slot id=docs>zolemba za kumasulira mwamakonda</slot>

settings_option_customTranslatorModule_m.description: A button to show list of translation modules

settings_option_history_enable_desc.message: Pamene yayatsidwa, kumasulira kudzajambulidwa ndikuwonekera pa <slot id=historyPage>tsamba la mbiri</slot>

settings_option_pageTranslation_detectLa.message: Sinthani zolemba patsamba la webu kuti mupeze chinenero chake. Pamene zayimitsidwa, chinenero chomwe chatchulidwa mu <slot id=docs>metadata ya tsamba</slot> chidzagwiritsidwa ntchito

settings_option_pageTranslation_enableCo.message: Yatsani batani la menyu ya zochitika
Onjezani batani kuti musinthe kumasulira tsamba mu menyu ya zochitika za tsamba

settings_option_pageTranslation_excludeS.message: Mndandanda wa zosankha za CSS za zinthu zomwe zidzachotsedwe mu kumasulira. Chosankha chimodzi pa mzere. Ngati chinthu chikugwirizana ndi chilichonse mwa zosankha izi, zolemba zake, mawonekedwe ake, ndi zinthu zomwe zili mkati sizidzamasuliridwa

settings_option_pageTranslation_lazyTran.message: Pamene njira iyi yayatsidwa, zinthu zowoneka zokha zidzamasuliridwa. Njira iyi imachepetsa kuchuluka kwa netiweki

settings_option_pageTranslation_original.message: Onetsani popup ndi zolemba zoyambirira mukamapita pamwamba pa zolemba zomasuliridwa

settings_option_pageTranslation_shortcut.message:
Chidule chosinthira kumasulira tsamba
Dinani ESC kuti mubwezeretse makiyi

settings_option_pageTranslation_translat.message:
Lowetsani mayina a <slot id=htmlAttributes>mawonekedwe a HTML</slot> kuti musinthe, mawonekedwe amodzi pa mzere
Mawonekedwe omwe ali pamndandandawu okha ndi omwe adzamasuliridwa

settings_option_popupTab_pageTranslator_.message: Onetsani gulu lokhala ndi kupita patsogolo kwa kumasulira tsamba mu pulogalamu yowonjezera

settings_option_selectTranslation_detect.message: Mukayatsa, malemba osankhidwa adzasanthulidwa kuti adziwe chinenero chomasulira. Apo ayi, chinenero cha tsamba lidzagwiritsidwa ntchito

settings_option_selectTranslation_enable.message: Mukayatsa chinthu ichi, mutha kusankha malemba aliwonse patsamba ndikumasulira mu pulogalamu yowonekera

settings_option_selectTranslation_focusO.message: Kuyang'ana zokha pa batani la kumasulira
Batani la kumasulira likawonekera patsamba, lidzayang'aniridwa zokha

settings_option_selectTranslation_isUseA.message: Lolani gawo la kumasulira kuti lidziwe chinenero cha malemba

Chinenero cha malemba chikapanda kudziwika kwanuko ndipo njira iyi yayatsidwa, malembawo adzamasuliridwa ndi chinenero "auto" ngati chithandizidwa.
Mukaletsa njira iyi, njira ina idzagwiritsidwa ntchito kukhazikitsa chinenero choyambira cha malemba

settings_option_selectTranslation_mode_i.message: Masulira malemba kudzera pa menyu ya zochitika

settings_option_selectTranslation_modifi.message: Sankhani makiyi omwe ayenera kukanikizidwa pa kiyibodi kuti muwonetse kumasulira

settings_option_selectTranslation_rememb.message: Kumbukirani chinenero cha malemba osankhidwa posachedwa

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOn.message: Onetsani batani la kumasulira kamodzi pa kusankha malemba
Batani lidzawonekera kamodzi kokha pa kusankha malemba Aliwonse kuti liwonekere kachiwiri, sankhani malembawo kachiwiri

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOr.message: Onjezani gawo lokhala ndi malemba oyambirira ku pulogalamu yowonekera ya kumasulira

settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.description: Njira iyi ndi yokhudza kusankha malemba kudzera pa mbewa

settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.message: Anyalanyazani kusankha malemba ngati batani lamanzere la mbewa litasulidwa kunja kwa gawo lokhala ndi malemba osankhidwa

settings_option_selectTranslation_timeou.message: Kuchedwa musanabisale batani la pulogalamu yowonekera
Kuchedwa mu milliseconds musanabisale batani pamene cholozera sichili pamwamba pake. Kukhala pamwamba pa batani kumabwezeretsa nthawi. Kuti musachotse zokha, ikani mtengo kukhala wochepera 1

settings_option_selectTranslation_zIndex.message: Onjezani mtengo uwu ngati zinthu patsamba zina zikuphimba popup yokhala ndi mawu omasuliridwa

settings_option_textTranslator_rememberT.message: Kukumbukira mawu omasuliridwa nthawi ina pamene zenera likatsegulidwa

settings_option_textTranslator_suggestLa.message: Kuwonetsa chinenero cha mawu omwe apezeka
Nthawi zonse pezani ndi kusonyeza chinenero
Mukachotsa, malingaliro a chinenero amawonekera kokha ngati chinenero choyambira chakhazikitsidwa kukhala "auto"

settings_option_translateScheduler_delay.message: Wokonza nthawi ya kumasulira amachepetsa kuchuluka kwa zopempha ku API ya utumiki wa kumasulira powonjezera mawu ambiri momwe angathere kuti atumize mu pempho limodzi. Wokonza nthawi adikirira nthawi yotchulidwa mu milliseconds kuti asonkhanitse mawu ambiri asanayambe kumasulira

settings_option_translateScheduler_retry.message: Wokonza nthawi adzayesanso kumasulira mawu pamene zolakwika za kumasulira zikachitika. Njirayi imakhazikitsa malire a kuyesanso. Ikani nambala yochepa kuti mulole kuyesanso kopanda malire

settings_option_translatorModule_desc.message: Ubwino wa kumasulira ndi zilankhulo zomwe zilipo zimadalira module ya kumasulira

settings_option_ttsCustomModules.message: Ma module a synthesis a mawu omwe mwachita mwamakonda

settings_option_ttsCustomModules_button.message: Kuwongolera ma module a synthesis a mawu

settings_option_ttsCustomModules_desc.message: Mutha kuwonjezera ma module a synthesis a mawu omwe amagwiritsa ntchito mautumiki ndi ma injini a mawu omwe mumakonda. Werengani zambiri mu <slot id=docs>zolemba za TTS mwamakonda</slot>

settings_option_ttsModule_desc.message: Injini ya mawu yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito poyankhula mawu

textTranslator_suggestLanguage.message: Zikuwoneka ngati chinenero cha mawu ndi <slot id=languageSuggest>$language_name$</slot>

textTranslator_translateInputPlaceholder.description: Request to user input some text for translation

translatorsManagerWindow_emptyTranslator.message: Palibe magawo osinthira omwe awonjezedwa pano

translatorsManagerWindow_message_transla.message: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa gawo losinthira "$translator_name$"?

ttsManagerWindow_emptyTranslatorsListTex.message: Palibe magawo a TTS omwe awonjezedwa pano

ttsManagerWindow_message_ttsRemoveConfir.message: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa gawo la TTS "$tts_name$"?

validation_numberBetweenRange.message: Mtengo uyenera kukhala nambala pakati pa $1 ndi $2
